alert.note: Alert for Orange; Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 15 at 10:19PM EDT until March 15 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Melbourne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Orange County in east central Florida... North central Osceola County in east central Florida... * Until 1045 PM EDT. * At 1018 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Osceola Heritage Park, or over Buena Ventura Lakes, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Orlando, Kissimmee, Orlando International Airport, Buena Ventura Lakes and East Lake Toho. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
